title: Help & Support
description: Find answers to common questions related to Akshify. If you need further help, contact our support team.

faqs.question: How do I create a new task?
faqs.answer: To create a task, tap on the '+' icon on the home screen, enter task details, set priority, and press 'Save'.

faqs.question: How can I assign a task to someone else?
faqs.answer: When creating or editing a task, select 'Assign to' and choose a user from your team. The assigned person will get a notification.

faqs.question: Can I set deadlines and reminders for tasks?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can set due dates and enable notifications to receive reminders before the deadline.

faqs.question: How do I track task progress?
faqs.answer: Each task has a status indicator. You can mark tasks as 'Pending', 'In Progress', or 'Completed'. The dashboard also shows task progress in real-time.

faqs.question: Is there a way to filter or sort tasks?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use filters to sort tasks by due date, priority, or status. Additionally, you can search for specific tasks using keywords.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with my team on tasks?
faqs.answer: Yes, Akshify allows you to invite team members, assign tasks, leave comments, and track work progress in a shared workspace.

faqs.question: What happens if I delete a task?
faqs.answer: Deleted tasks move to the 'Trash' section and can be restored within 30 days. After that, they are permanently removed.

faqs.question: How do I change my account settings?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Settings' from the profile menu to update your email, password, profile picture, and notification preferences.

faqs.question: Can I sync tasks across multiple devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Akshify automatically syncs tasks in real-time across all devices linked to your account.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us at support@akshify.com or use the in-app chat for immediate assistance.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted for premium features?
faqs.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and UPI payments. Subscriptions can be managed in the 'Billing' section.

faqs.question: Is there a way to recover deleted tasks after 30 days?
faqs.answer: No, permanently deleted tasks cannot be recovered. We recommend archiving important tasks instead of deleting them.

faqs.question: How do I enable dark mode?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Settings' > 'Appearance' and toggle 'Dark Mode' to switch between light and dark themes.

faqs.question: Can I export my task list?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can export your tasks as a CSV or PDF file from the 'Reports' section.

faqs.question: Does Akshify work offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can create and edit tasks offline. Once you reconnect to the internet, changes will sync automatically.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions to reset your password via email.

faqs.question: How do I enable push notifications?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Settings' > 'Notifications' and enable push notifications for task updates and reminders.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with Akshify?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use end-to-end encryption to protect your data. Additionally, you can enable two-factor authentication for extra security.
